Demo Image Region

Options :

regionDefaultsobject
The default options for a new region
contentstring | DOMelement
The content that will appear inside the region as HTML. The text will be hidden if overflow. (default = '')
leftint
The x positionning of the region (default = 0)
topint
The y positionning of the region (default = 0)
widthint
The width of the region (default = 32)
heightint
The height of the region (default = 32)
minWidthint
The minimum width of the region when resized (default = 32)
minHeightint
The minimum height of the region when resized (default = 32)
resizableboolean
If the region can be resized (default = true)
draggableboolean
If the region can be moved (dragged)(default = true)
selectableboolean
If the region can be selected. If false, the region cannot be dragged or resized. (default = true)
regionsobject
A list of all region to add initially. The object is composed of the region id as the key and the region options as value (see regionDefaults for the region options) (default = {})
